```{r}
library("rms")
```
```{r}
data<-read.csv("2019-clinical-features.csv",header=TRUE)
data
```

```{r}
d <- Hmisc::describe(data)
#html(d, size = 80, scroll = TRUE)
p <- plot(d)
p$Continuous
```

```{r}
m0 <- lrm(Borrelia~., data=data, x = TRUE, y = TRUE)
print(m0)
```

```{r}
m0_anova <- anova(m0)
m0_update <- update(m0, x=TRUE, y=TRUE)
m0_val <- validate(m0, B=1000)
m0_cal <- calibrate(m0, B=1000)

pdf("anova.pdf", useDingbats=FALSE) 
plot(m0_anova)
dev.off()


pdf("val.pdf", useDingbats=FALSE) 
plot(m0_val)
dev.off()

pdf("cal.pdf", useDingbats=FALSE) 
plot(m0_cal)
dev.off()

```

```{r}
dd <- datadist(data)
  
options(datadist='dd')
f <- m0_update

pdf("or.pdf", useDingbats=FALSE) 
plot(summary(f), log=TRUE)
dev.off()
```
